TextEng: You must be one of the new city guard. Hopefully you can do something about those zombies in the Beggar's Nest.
Text: 새로 온 경비병이구나. 거지 소굴의 좀비들을 좀 어떻게 해줬으면 해.

TextEng: You must be one of the new city guard. Hopefully you can do something about those zombies in the Beggar's Nest.
Text: 새로 온 경비병이구나. 거지 소굴의 좀비들을 좀 어떻게 해줬으면 해.

TextEng: Hmph! You look like you must be one of them escaped convicts from the prison break in the Peninsula district!
Text: 흥! 넌 반도 지구 감옥에서 탈출한 죄수처럼 생겼군!

TextEng: What are you doing with no clothes?! You want to get sick and catch the plague?!
Text: 왜 옷을 안 입고 다녀?! 역병에 걸리고 싶어?!

TextEng: Why are you naked? You must be plague stricken! Get away from me!
Text: 왜 벌거벗었어? 역병에 걸렸구나! 저리 가!

TextEng: A naked plague victim! Don't touch me!
Text: 벌거벗은 역병 환자! 만지지 마!

TextEng: Those wounds look terrible! You better get looked after before you come down with the Wailing Death.
Text: 그 상처 끔찍해 보여! 울부짖는 죽음에 걸리기 전에 치료 받아.

TextEng: You're bleeding all over the place! Get some healing before your wounds get infected with plague!
Text: 온통 피를 흘리고 다니네! 상처에 역병이 감염되기 전에 치료 받아!

TextEng: That must have been some fight you were in. Don't those wounds hurt?
Text: 대단한 싸움에서 왔나 보군. 그 상처 안 아파?

TextEng: You aren't quite right in the head, are you? Maybe you escaped during the prison break in the Penisula district.
Text: 머리가 좀 이상하지? 반도 지구 탈옥 때 도망친 거 아니야?

TextEng: I heard the Beggar's Nest is crawling with zombies infected by the plague!
Text: 거지 소굴에 역병에 감염된 좀비들이 득실거린다던데!

TextEng: Not too bright, are you? Maybe your mind was destroyed by the plague! Get away from me!
Text: 별로 똑똑하진 않구나. 역병에 정신이 망가졌나 봐! 저리 가!

TextEng: Quit waving your weapon around like a thug! Criminals aren't running things around here - this isn't the Docks district!
Text: 깡패처럼 무기 휘두르지 마! 여기선 범죄자들이 판치지 않아 - 여긴 부두 지구가 아니라고!

TextEng: I heard the Blacklake district nobles have a cure for the plague, but they won't share it with us common folk!
Text: 검은호수 지구 귀족들이 역병 치료제를 가지고 있다던데, 우리 평민에겐 안 나눠준대!

TextEng: Think carrying that weapon will keep the Wailing Death at bay?
Text: 그 무기를 들고 다니면 울부짖는 죽음을 막을 수 있을 것 같아?

TextEng: You're a priest! Why has your god let the Wailing Death kill so many of us!?
Text: 당신 사제잖아! 왜 당신 신은 울부짖는 죽음이 우리를 이렇게 많이 죽이게 내버려둬?!

TextEng: You're a cleric - why don't you do something about the zombies terrorizing the Beggar's Nest!
Text: 당신 성직자잖아 - 거지 소굴을 공포에 떨게 하는 좀비들을 왜 어떻게 안 해!

TextEng: You're a holy <man/woman> - can't you make the nobles in the Blacklake district share their cure with the rest of us?
Text: 당신 성직자잖아 - 검은호수 지구 귀족들이 우리한테도 치료제를 나눠주게 할 수 없어?

TextEng: Hmph. Best keep your magics to yourself around here, <sir/madam>. Some blame sorcery for the plague!
Text: 흥. 여기선 마법을 쓰지 않는 게 좋을 거야. 역병이 마법 탓이라고 하는 사람들도 있거든!

TextEng: There's anarchy in the Docks district! I heard criminals have taken over and the city guard are afraid to go in there now.
Text: 부두 지구는 무법천지야! 범죄자들이 장악해서 경비병들도 무서워서 못 들어간대.

TextEng: Heard about the prison break in the Peninsula district? As if the plague wasn't bad enough!
Text: 반도 지구 탈옥 사건 들었어? 역병만으로도 모자랐나 봐!

TextEng: They say plague corpses walk the streets in the Beggar's Nest, feasting on the living!
Text: 거지 소굴에서 역병 시체들이 거리를 걸어다니며 산 사람을 잡아먹는다더라!

TextEng: The nobles in the Blacklake district have sealed themselves away from everyone. There's something strange there, mark my words!
Text: 검은호수 지구 귀족들은 모두와 담을 쌓았어. 거기서 뭔가 이상한 일이 벌어지고 있어, 내 말 기억해!

TextEng: Be wary of the humans in this town. They'll tax you extra for your <race> blood, I'm not joking.
Text: 이 마을 인간들을 조심해. <race> 혈통이라고 세금을 더 물릴 거야, 농담 아니야.

TextEng: A pretty girl like you should stay away from places like the Docks. They are rough at the best of times.
Text: 예쁜 아가씨는 부두 같은 곳에 가까이 가면 안 돼. 평소에도 거친 곳이거든.

TextEng: Them nobles are up to something in the Blacklake district. I hear they got themselves a secret cure for the plague!
Text: 검은호수 지구 귀족들이 뭔가 꾸미고 있어. 비밀 치료제를 가지고 있다더라!

TextEng: We sure don't have many local girls who look like you - not since the plague killed 'em all off.
Text: 너처럼 생긴 동네 아가씨는 별로 없어 - 역병이 다 죽인 뒤로는.

TextEng: Ain't you handsome! Better stay away from the Docks - the thugs there will mess up that pretty face something awful.
Text: 잘생겼네! 부두에는 가지 마 - 거기 깡패들이 그 예쁜 얼굴을 망쳐놓을 거야.

TextEng: Them nobles are up to something in the Blacklake district. I hear they got themselves a secret cure for the plague!
Text: 검은호수 지구 귀족들이 뭔가 꾸미고 있어. 비밀 치료제를 가지고 있다더라!

TextEng: You're a handsome one. Just don't catch the plague, or your looks won't last long.
Text: 잘생겼네. 역병만 안 걸리면 좋겠다, 안 그러면 그 외모 오래 못 갈 거야.

TextEng: A word of advice: be careful. If you catch the Wailing Death, you'll not be among the living for long.
Text: 충고 하나 해줄게: 조심해. 울부짖는 죽음에 걸리면 오래 못 살아.

TextEng: I heard there was a prison break in the Peninsula district. I wonder if the rumors are true.
Text: 반도 지구에서 탈옥 사건이 있었다던데. 소문이 사실인지 궁금하네.

TextEng: I heard there was a prison break in the Peninsula district. I wonder if the rumors are true.
Text: 반도 지구에서 탈옥 사건이 있었다던데. 소문이 사실인지 궁금하네.

TextEng: Them nobles are up to something in the Blacklake district. I hear they got themselves a secret cure for the plague!
Text: 검은호수 지구 귀족들이 뭔가 꾸미고 있어. 비밀 치료제를 가지고 있다더라!

TextEng: Them nobles are up to something in the Blacklake district. I hear they got themselves a secret cure for the plague!
Text: 검은호수 지구 귀족들이 뭔가 꾸미고 있어. 비밀 치료제를 가지고 있다더라!

TextEng: People like you belong in the Docks district - along with the rest of the thugs and ruffians!
Text: 너 같은 놈은 부두 지구에 어울려 - 다른 깡패들이랑 불량배들이랑!

TextEng: You must be from up in the mountains... or maybe even further, right? The plague spread up there yet?
Text: 산에서 왔나... 아니면 더 먼 데서? 거기까지 역병이 퍼졌어?

TextEng: What a brute you are! You must have escaped during the prison break in the Peninsula district.
Text: 정말 난폭하게 생겼네! 반도 지구 탈옥 때 도망친 게 틀림없어.

TextEng: You're obviously a thug. Say, are you a member of that criminal organization that's taken over the Docks district?
Text: 넌 분명 깡패야. 그래, 부두 지구를 장악한 범죄 조직 소속이야?

TextEng: Well, wonderful. More <race> rabble wandering about. Plague carriers are what your kind are!
Text: 아, 좋아. <race> 찌꺼기가 또 돌아다니네. 너희 족속은 역병 운반자야!

TextEng: The city guard can't keep order anymore! They don't even care that there was a prison break in the Penisula district.
Text: 경비병들이 더 이상 질서를 유지 못해! 반도 지구에서 탈옥이 있었는데도 신경도 안 써.

TextEng: Oh, hello. You're one of those <race> folk, right? Plague take all the <race> race, I say!
Text: 오, 안녕. 너 <race> 족이지? 역병이 <race> 족을 다 데려가버렸으면!

TextEng: Those nobles in the Blacklake; one of them was hoarding food! I had heard they had a cure, but it was just plain old greed!
Text: 검은호수의 귀족들 말이야. 그중 한 명이 식량을 사재기하고 있었대! 치료제가 있다고 들었는데, 그냥 평범한 탐욕이었어!

TextEng: Did you have something to do with the prison break in he Peninsula? Sorry, I didn't mean it like that. You look rough, I guess, but you might have helped stop it, right?
Text: 반도 탈옥 사건에 관련 있어? 미안, 그런 뜻이 아니었어. 거칠어 보이긴 하지만, 막는 걸 도왔을 수도 있잖아, 그치?

TextEng: Those nobles in the Blacklake; one of them was hoarding food! I had heard they had a cure, but it was just plain old greed!
Text: 검은호수의 귀족들 말이야. 그중 한 명이 식량을 사재기하고 있었대! 치료제가 있다고 들었는데, 그냥 평범한 탐욕이었어!

TextEng: You know the rumors I heard about the prison break? They were true! At least, that's what I hear. I guess it was pretty bad in the Peninsula, but it's quiet now.
Text: 탈옥에 대해 들은 소문 알아? 사실이었어! 적어도 내가 들은 바로는. 반도에서 꽤 심각했던 것 같은데, 이제 조용해졌어.

TextEng: Are you one fo the new militia recruits? Maybe you had something to do with clearing the zombies out of the Beggar's Nest? Good on you if you did.
Text: 새 민병대 신병이야? 거지 소굴에서 좀비들 치운 거랑 관련 있어? 그랬다면 잘했어.

TextEng: Was that you that took care of the prison break in the Peninsula? I heard it was one of the new recruits, but I didn't get any names. Thanks if it was.
Text: 반도 탈옥 사건 처리한 게 너야? 새 신병 중 한 명이라고 들었는데, 이름은 못 들었어. 그랬다면 고마워.

TextEng: Are you one fo the new militia recruits? Maybe you had something to do with clearing the zombies out of the Beggar's Nest? Good on you if you did.
Text: 새 민병대 신병이야? 거지 소굴에서 좀비들 치운 거랑 관련 있어? 그랬다면 잘했어.

TextEng: Those nobles in the Blacklake; one of them was hoarding food! I had heard they had a cure, but it was just plain old greed!
Text: 검은호수의 귀족들 말이야. 그중 한 명이 식량을 사재기하고 있었대! 치료제가 있다고 들었는데, 그냥 평범한 탐욕이었어!

TextEng: Those nobles in the Blacklake; one of them was hoarding food! I had heard they had a cure, but it was just plain old greed!
Text: 검은호수의 귀족들 말이야. 그중 한 명이 식량을 사재기하고 있었대! 치료제가 있다고 들었는데, 그냥 평범한 탐욕이었어!

TextEng: I guess I should apologize to the city militia. I heard the Peninsula was out of control, but now everything is back to normal there. Well, normal plus plague.
Text: 시 민병대에 사과해야겠어. 반도가 통제 불능이라고 들었는데, 이제 거기 다 정상으로 돌아왔대. 뭐, 정상에 역병 추가지만.

TextEng: I heard one fo the militia went to the Blacklake and told those nobles to smarten' up! Still no cure, but at least they are catching hell, too.
Text: 민병대 한 명이 검은호수에 가서 귀족들 혼냈다더라! 아직 치료제는 없지만, 적어도 그들도 고생하고 있어.

TextEng: Id' stay in the core, if I were you. I mean, sure, there's no more zombies in the Beggar's Nest, but the plague will get you just the same.
Text: 내가 너라면 중심부에 있겠어. 그러니까, 거지 소굴에 좀비는 없어졌지만 역병은 여전하거든.

TextEng: You brute. I'd tell you to go to the Docks with all the other ruffians, but I heard a militia recruit cleaned it all up! I hear a lot of stuff, though.
Text: 이 난폭한 놈. 다른 불량배들이랑 부두로 가라고 했겠지만, 민병대 신병이 다 정리했다더라! 뭐, 나도 많이 듣긴 하지만.

TextEng: There was a prison break in the Peninsula, but it's over now. I heard it was a new militia recruit that took care of it. Don't know for sure.
Text: 반도에서 탈옥이 있었는데, 이제 끝났어. 새 민병대 신병이 처리했다던데. 확실히는 몰라.

TextEng: At least the Docks have calmed down a bit. I heard there were thieves everywhere, but one of the guards went in there and took care of it.
Text: 적어도 부두는 좀 진정됐어. 도둑들이 득실거렸다는데, 경비병 한 명이 들어가서 정리했대.

TextEng: First I heard that the nobles in Blacklake had a cure, now I hear they don't. Can't you make your god make things clearer?
Text: 처음엔 검은호수 귀족들이 치료제가 있다더니, 이제 없다고 해. 당신 신한테 좀 더 명확하게 해달라고 못해?

TextEng: I suppose you're going to claim your god had something to do with the zombies leaving the Beggar's Nest? Cure the plague, then we'll talk.
Text: 거지 소굴에서 좀비들이 떠난 게 당신 신 덕분이라고 할 거야? 역병을 치료하면 그때 얘기하자.

TextEng: There were rumors about a cure in the Blacklake, but I guess it isn't true. I wish it was, even if they weren't going to share.
Text: 검은호수에 치료제가 있다는 소문이 있었는데, 사실이 아닌 것 같아. 안 나눠줬더라도 있었으면 좋았을 텐데.

TextEng: At least the Beggar's Nest is clear of zombies now. Of course, the number plague-dead could still bury us all.
Text: 적어도 거지 소굴은 이제 좀비가 없어. 물론 역병으로 죽은 시체 수가 우리 모두를 묻을 수도 있지만.
